title: Ticket #3475: Improve python bindings for job submission
description:
The HTCondor python bindings could do a better job with the job submission interface:

  • Right now, one needs to provide a fairly ClassAd in order to use the submit interface, include various schedd bits the user never otherwise sees. If we use the CreateJobAd() function, we can reduce the number of user-specified attributes.
  • The job submit interface is not covered by the integration tests.
  • Remote submission is not possible as we provide no mechanism for moving a sandbox.

Let's improve the situation!
